name: Erebus: The Creation of the World
name_original: Erebus: The Creation of the World
description:
Platform : MacOS

In the begining of the universe, there was only chaos. Then out of the nothingness came Erebus, the unknowable place where death dwells, and Night (Nyx). All else was nothing, empty, dark, silent. Then Erebus slept with Night (Nyx), who gave birth to Ether, the heavenly light, and to Day the earthly light. 

You are the last of Erebus Sperm, and your job is to get to the Light Orb (Nyx’s Ovum), and fertilize it before you died. You have 60 seconds of lifespan, and the Evil-Lava Sperm to avoid along the way. If you can’t make it to the ovum, It means Ether and Day will not be born, and so the rest of the world.

Goodluck, survivor. The fate of the whole word is in your hand. 

Controls :

  • Mouse Left Click : Fire Grapple
  • Mouse Right Click : Release Grapple

Objective : Find the Light Orb before the time’s up. Avoid all Lava and it’s Creature.

Feature :

  • Time Countdown Indicator on the top left of the screen to show your lifespan
  • Your vision is limited (Light Play)
  • You only have one life. Die, and you lose.

Good Luck and Enjoy the game.

All assets are made personally.

Source code : https://gitlab.com/abrahamwill/erebus-gamejam
